content.raw:
Does this pull request have any impact on visual engine performance?  E.g. something like the [CameraSensor test](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/9410f80cf7a70accd8cde7617b2800872283849f/test/integration/camera_sensor.cc?at=default) could be made into a performance benchmark test?  But we probably need a more complex environment for the test.

Otherwise the upgraded shadows looks very good.

Does this pull request have any impact on visual engine performance? E.g. something like the CameraSensor test could be made into a performance benchmark test? But we probably need a more complex environment for the test.

Otherwise the upgraded shadows looks very good.
